content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, once you've picked a spot for <style=NpcName>Yunguo</style> with the <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style>, come back here to find me. It's getting late, and we still have preparations to make.
info: 云果选址-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Ah, you're still helping <style=NpcName>Yunguo</style> pick a place to live? Hoho... {A思考}It's often more difficult to decide for someone else than for yourself.
info: 云果选址-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Are you worried about whether she'll like it or not? Or if you're really doing the right thing? Don't worry, I believe that everyone will support you no matter your choice.
info: 云果选址-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II
